title: new 2 story house for sale
details: new 2 story house for sale, 1 1/2 kilometer to the kandy road, 1 kilometer to the viharamahadevi balika, fully tiled, 2 bed rooms, 2 sitting rooms, 2 kitchens, electricy and water, water tank, parking for 2 vehicles, good sorroundings, 3 baths, 2 inside and 1 outside servent toilet, can use as a 2 units, hot water
